EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-03-02-Channel-TSA-Infrastructure-Survey.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: $10 Amazon Gift Card for a 2 Minute Survey | TSA Presents: Turbonomic's Infrastructure Optimization Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/SS5F6HJ?marketo_4sgek4bxhs={{lead.id}}]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, If you've ever worked with a member of the TSA team, you know we are driven first and foremost by delivery the highest quality services to our customers. We strive to be a strategic partner for you and work exclusively with technologies that bring the same customer-centric mentality to their business. That is why we are excited to announce, with Turbonomic, an opportunity for us to give back to you!
We are happy to debut the launch of our Infrastructure Optimization Survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/SS5F6HJ?marketo_4sgek4bxhs={{lead.id}}]]>. We are offering a $10 Amazon gift card for completing the 3-minute survey by today, end of the day. Furthermore, we are offering $50 Amazon gift card for agreeing to a 30-minute meeting with your TSA representative and a Turbonomic engineer (meeting must complete by April 9th). We look forward to the opportunity to speak with you about how the TSA-Turbonomic partnership is changing the IT industry for the better, but we are much more excited to hear your feedback. <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/SS5F6HJ?marketo_4sgek4bxhs={{lead.id}}]]> - The TSA & Turbonomic Teams
